brief:
Datatype for storing and playing movies. Movies must be located in the sketch's data folder 
 or an accessible place on the network to load without an error.

methods.name: frameRate()
methods.desc: Sets how often frames are read from the movie. Setting the fps parameter to 4, for example, will cause 4 frames to be read per second.

methods.name: speed()
methods.desc: Sets the relative playback speed of the movie. The rate parameters sets the speed where 2.0 will play the movie twice as fast, 0.5 will play at half the speed, and -1 will play the movie in normal speed in reverse.

methods.name: duration()
methods.desc:
Returns the length of the movie in seconds. If the movie is 1 minute and
 20 seconds long the value returned will be 80.0.

methods.name: time()
methods.desc:
Returns the location of the playback head in seconds. For example, if
 the movie has been playing for 4 seconds, the number 4.0 will be returned.

methods.name: jump()
methods.desc: Jumps to a specific location within a movie. The parameter where is in terms of seconds. For example, if the movie is 12.2 seconds long, calling jump(6.1) would go to the middle of the movie.

methods.name: available()
methods.desc: Returns "true" when a new movie frame is available to read.

methods.name: play()
methods.desc: Plays a movie one time and stops at the last frame.

methods.name: loop()
methods.desc: Plays a movie continuously, restarting it when it's over.

methods.name: noLoop()
methods.desc:
If a movie is looping, calling noLoop() will cause it to play until the
 end and then stop on the last frame.

methods.name: pause()
methods.desc:
Pauses a movie during playback. If a movie is started again with play(),
 it will continue from where it was paused.

methods.name: stop()
methods.desc:
Stops a movie from continuing. The playback returns to the beginning so
 when a movie is played, it will begin from the beginning.

methods.name: read()
methods.desc: Reads the current frame of the movie.

description:
Datatype for storing and playing movies. Movies must be located in the sketch's data folder 
 or an accessible place on the network to load without an error.
name: Movie
